casebody.data:
Henry M. BEHRE, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. INTERNATIONAL PROJECTOR CORPORATION, Defendant-Appellee. No. 343. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 6, 1931. Manton Marks, of New York City, for appellant. Bruce R. Tuttle, of New York City (N. A. Smyth and J. H. O’Connell, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
